articles.author: Lauren Forristal
articles.title: Amazon brings generative AI-powered recaps to Prime Video - TechCrunch
articles.description: Instead of scouring the internet for a summary of a TV show, which often risks unintentionally revealing major plot points, Prime Video’s latest feature Prime Video subscribers now get “X-Ray Recaps,” generative AI-powered summaries of TV show seasons, episod…
articles.content: Instead of scouring the internet for a summary of a TV show, which often risks unintentionally revealing major plot points, Prime Videos latest feature aims to save viewers from encountering any spoi… [+1877 chars]
